title: Visual Bug on Azir
body: I normally use Range Indicator when quick casting, so Azir's W normally gives me the range and then a range indicator to the Auto Attack Range of Azir's Soldiers, but now it's just a target cursor. Could you guys please change that back? Or was it intentional?

replies.body:
Will be fixed next patch with a slightly different but more accurate indicator. ;) 

Thanks for the report.
I'm so glad you commented on this, I've been pulling my hair out to try and get them back!
